tgt_original: buddhyā tu parimāṇaparyantaparicchedataḥ paramāṇuḥ prajñapyate |  tatra samudāyo'  pi sapradeśaḥ |

tadyathā bhūtaparamāṇo rūpaśabdagandharasa spraṣṭavyānāmanindriya indriyavarjyānāṃ sendriye sendriyāṇāmekadeśāvinirbhāgaḥ |  tasmādeva bhūtaparamāṇostadanyasya samudāyasya bhūtabhautikasya |  tasya punaḥ kṛtsnasya rūpasamudāyasya vividhadravyaśilāniṣpiṣṭāpsamāyuktavanmiśrībhāvā vinirbhāgo draṣṭavyo no tu tilamudgamāṣakulattharāśivat
sarvaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ mahābhūtadeśāśritameva na mahābhūtadeśamatiricya vartate ||
ato'pi mahābhūtāśritamupādāyarūpamityucyate |  ata eva ca mahābhūtānāṃ mahābhūtamiti saṃjñā |
tadyathā pṛthivyāpastejo vāto rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cakṣurādīni ca rūpāṇi pañcendriyāṇi sthāpayitvā manogocarameva rūpaṃ |
paramāṇurapi sapradeśaḥ |  samudāyastu sāvayavo na paramāṇuḥ |
paramāṇureva hyavayavaḥ |  sa ca samudāyasyaivāsti na paramāṇoḥ |
